In Japan, a magnetic levitation train breaks its own speed record,...
In Egypt, former president Mohammed Morsi has been sentenced to jail...
...in connection to the killing of protesters in 2012.
In South Korea, Prime Minister Lee Wan-koo offers to resign amid allegations...
...he accepted illegal funds from a businessman.
In Italy, 27 of 28 survivors of a migrant boat shipwreck,...
...in which up to 900 are feared dead, are taken to Sicily.
And finally from Pakistan, Chinese President Xi Jinping...
...saying both countries "share a common stake in security."
